title: Rick Rieder Overhauls BlackRock Bond Team as HPS Clout Grows
description: BlackRock Inc. is revamping its massive fixed-income division around new investment strategies and artificial intelligence, as the unit’s leveraged finance business moves under an executive team from the firm’s newly acquired HPS Investment Partners.

title: Balancing the promise of health AI with its carbon costs
description: The health care industry is increasingly relying on artificial intelligence—in responding to patient queries, for example—and a new Cornell study shows how decision-makers can use real-world data to build sustainability into new AI systems.

title: AI and coding educator unveils state-of-the-art tech innovation lab in Birmingham to boost digital skills
description: The UK’s largest educator in artificial intelligence and coding has unveiled new £2.5 million state-of-the-art facilities in Birmingham aimed at increasing accessibility and inclusiveness in higher education.
content:

content:

title: Whitney Houston is going on tour 13 years after her death, thanks to AI
description: A new concert experience uses artificial intelligence to isolate the late singer’s vocals, bringing her voice back to the stage with a live symphony orchestra.
content:
When Whitney Houston died in 2012, she was just 48 years old. Now, 13 years later, one of the most iconic voices in music is making a return. And, as you might expect, artificial intelligence is involved.

description: Opposition parties in Assam have said they will lodge a police complaint against the BJP over a controversial artificial intelligence-generated video circulated on social media.

description: Redis on Wednesday announced an expansion of its artificial intelligence (AI) strategy with the acquisition of real-time data platform Decodable and the launch of LangCache, a fully managed semantic caching service.
